item.description:
EVENT: Join other Mosaic members as we go apple picking at Honey Pot Hill Orchards in Stow where we’ll have a variety of apples to choose from among them MacIntosh, Cortland, Empire, Red and Golden Delicious. For more information visit: http://www.honeypothill.com/pickyourown.php

Trip's Coordinator: Nancy

MEET: At noon in the parking lot of the Honey Pot Hill Orchards, Stow, Massachusetts, 01775. Orchard phone: 978-562-5666.

COST:·        Big Bag, 20 lbs: $24, this bag allows up to 5 people into the orchard.

·         Medium bag, 10 lbs: $16, this bag allows up to 3 people into the orchard. Cash and check only at pick your own.  There is an ATM at the Farm Store.

·         There is no admission or charge for parking.

There is a $5 charge for Meetups participants and guests which can be credited to a full Mosaic membership of $25.

RSVP: Participants should reply by Saturday, Oct. 6
item.how_to_find_us: Rsvp to Nancy for more details

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Apple Picking in Stow MA
